Title: CATH-Gene3D: Generation of the resource and its use in obtaining structural and functional annotations for protein sequences
Abstract: © Springer Science+Business Media LLC 2017.This chapter describes the generation of the data in the CATH-Gene3D online resource and how it can be used to study protein domains and their evolutionary relationships. Methods will be presented for: comparing protein structures, recognizing homologs, predicting domain structures within protein sequences, and subclassifying superfamilies into functionally pure families, together with a guide on using the webpages.
